entry.title: Azerbaijan cuts internet supply to Nagorno-Karabakh

media:group.media:title: Azerbaijan cuts internet supply to Nagorno-Karabakh
media:group.media:description:
As Azerbaijanโs blockade of Nagorno-Karabakh enters its second month, internet connection in Nagorno-Karabakh has been interrupted. According to the Internet operator in Nagorno-Karabakh, the cable leading from Armenia to Nagorno-Karabakh was damaged in the very section of the Lachin corridor, the only route between Armenia and Nagorno-Karabakh, where the Azerbaijani roadblock is located.

entry.title: Medicine shortages in Karabakh put childrenโs lives on the line

media:group.media:title: Medicine shortages in Karabakh put childrenโs lives on the line
media:group.media:description:
The life of a 9-year-old boy from Artsakh (Nagorno-Karabakh) now depends on medicine that cannot be found in the region. As a result of Azerbaijanโs blockade of the only road connecting Artsakh to Armenia, regular shipments of food and medicine have stopped. Narine Danielyan, the mother of an ill child, worries that should her sonโs condition worsen, he may be unable to receive proper treatment.

ยซิฑึึีกีญีตีกีถ ีคีซีฟีกีถีฏีตีกีถยป ีฐีฅึีฉีกีฏีกีถ ีฉีธีฒีกึีฏีดีกีถีจ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฃีฅีฟ ีีซีฃึีกีถ ิณึีซีฃีธึีตีกีถีจ ีกีถีคึีกีคีกีผีถีธึีด ีง ีีซีฏีธีฌ ีีกีทีซีถีตีกีถีซ ีฐีธึีถีพีกึีซ 10-ีซ ีดีกีดีธึีฌีซ ีกีฝีธึีฌีซีฝีซีถึ ิณึีซีฃีธึีตีกีถีจ, ีดีกีฝีถีกีพีธึีกีบีฅีฝ, ีพีฅึีฌีธึีฎีธึีด ีง ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีพีกึีนีกีบีฅีฟีซ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจ ิผีกีนีซีถีซ ีดีซีปีกีถึึีซ ีทีธึึีป ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีพีกีฎ ีณีฃีถีกีชีกีดีซ ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีตีกีฌึ
